Sample.Title: MZ_277_KO

Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA from TGCs was isolated using TRIzol (#15596026, Thermo Fisher Scientific). rRNA was depleted using NEBNext rRNA Depletion Kit (Human/Mouse/Rat) (NEB # E6310L). cDNA synthesis was performed using NEBNext Ultra II Directional RNA Library Prep Kit (NEB #E7760S) and NEBNext Multiplex Oligos for Illumina (Index Primer Set 1) (NEB # E7335S). Sequencing was performed using an Illumina NextSeq 500 with 75bp single read runs.

Sample.Description: Libraries were normalized, pooled, multiplexed, and sequenced on an Illumina NextSeq 500 with 75bp single read runs.
Sample.Data-Processing: Raw reads were demultiplexed into Fastq format allowing up to one mismatch using Illumina bcl-convert 3.10.5 Reads were aligned to UCSC genome mm10 with STAR aligner (version 2.7.3a ), using Ensembl 102 gene models. TPM values were generated using RSEM (version v1.3.0 ) Assembly: mm10 Supplementary files format and content: TPM gene expression in text file

Series.Title: c-Myc supports polyploidy and prevents senescence in the murine placenta [RNA-seq]
Series.Summary: To understand differential gene expression between wildtype and c-Myc null mouse trophoblast giant cells.
Series.Overall-Design: TGCs from 9.5 dpc stage were dissected as mentioned previously (Hannibal and Baker, 2016) cold PBS and embryos were used for genotyping. Total RNA from TGCs was isolated using TRIzol (#15596026, Thermo Fisher Scientific). rRNA was depleted using NEBNext rRNA Depletion Kit (Human/Mouse/Rat) (NEB # E6310L). cDNA synthesis was performed using NEBNext Ultra II Directional RNA Library Prep Kit (NEB #E7760S) and NEBNext Multiplex Oligos for Illumina (Index Primer Set 1) (NEB # E7335S). Sequencing was performed using an Illumina NextSeq 500 with 75bp single read runs.
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
